I would like to start off by introducing myself. My name is Coefficient, or you can call me Coco.
I love playing video games and I specialize in fighting games.
I am also a huge fan of Hololive.
I'm incredibly honored to the Hololive staff for allowing me the opportunity to send you guys a video message about Miko and Korone.
Now Miko and Korone are two of my most favorite VTubers from Hololive for two reasons.
